lexUnit.name: peel.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: remove the outer covering or skin from (a fruit, vegetable, etc.)

sentence.text: The talk was general , candlelit faces leaned across the table and the hands which peeled the fruit or fidgeted with the glasses were as individual as the faces .
